title: internetmemes
author: internetmemes
content: You probably know Rage comics if you're a meme lover. These are the absolute funniest original memes on internet , One of the most widely known meme faces is the troll face with its mischievous smile, which represents internet trolls. The Troll Face meme has been revived by some artist, who created a 3D version NFT of the meme on the web3. It's fun way to present memes on web3 , Whitelist are open a get a spot on twitter :  https://twitter.com/Internetmemes3 Would you be interested ?

comments.author: Wahyuihib
comments.body: It's really hard for me to pass judgment on meme coins.  Because I don't really understand meme coins.  So from I think the average meme coin has almost the same concept

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: To be honest,there is no original and unique idea here, it's the same old meme, but with glasses or a hat it looks boring.It is important to ask yourself the question:what is the function of this direction?all the same memes but in web3?I see only the goal of the developer to make money on this and that's it.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: It is really nice to think that troll face meme is revived, and is once again being endeared and appreciated. This is a classic, and preserving it would also mean preserving memories and and experience of those who were really into it at the time it came out. However, I don’t think that I am interested with it being affiliated to NFT since this seems to be just a scheme to make money out of it. Plus, the original creator of the troll face meme won’t even benefit and credited to such creation, which the original artist truly deserves.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: No thank you.NFTs is dead and for that I own NFTs anymore. It's not really a good investment because the spread order book is always -99%, see MONKEY NFTs. From 300,000$ going to 10$ ~LOL.Even shitcoin can still better rather than NFTs, we can cut your lose because have some orderbook to be fill. Meanwhile NFTs need to wait buyer first.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: internetmemes on November 30, 2022, 10:12:54 AMYou probably know Rage comics if you're a meme lover. These are the absolute funniest original memes on internet , One of the most widely known meme faces is the troll face with its mischievous smile, which represents internet trolls. The Troll Face meme has been revived by some artist, who created a 3D version NFT of the meme on the web3. It's fun way to present memes on web3 , Whitelist are open a get a spot on twitter :  https://twitter.com/Internetmemes3 Would you be interested ?I don't know them, maybe I've seen it before but I'm only here because of the NFT and I'd say that they're not that popular anymore. Although for such collections, if you're up for it and it's affordable you may get one and if it has got a big part of your childhood or memories or it's making you happy.You may want to spend how much it's worth right now but to think that if may go up in the future, it's much better if you don't think that much.
